optimized.regression

Class sumSquareResidualsThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • optimized.regression.sumSquareResidualsThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Double>

    public class sumSquareResidualsThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Double>

    sumSquareResidualsThread

    Calculates the derivative of the sum squared residuals for a partition of the dataset x and y.
    Since:
    2019-04-20
    Version:
    0.2
    Author:
    Neel Drain
